name: ShineOn Lip Jelly Hydrating Non-Sticky Lip Gloss
about: What it is: A bestselling, moisturizing lip gloss and lip oil hybrid that delivers a high shine finish without the stickiness, specially formulated for sensitive skin...Highlighted Ingredients:.- Apricot Kernel Oil: Nurtures and soothes lips..- Raspberry Seed Oil: Protects lips against damage from free radicals and environmental aggressors..- Rosehip Oil: Contains vitamins A and E while promoting cell repair and regeneration...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free...What Else You Need to Know: This vegan lip jelly is a gloss and oil in one made with a unique blend of nurturing oils to soothe and protect lips. It has the high shine of a gloss, the comfort of a balm, and a touch of juicy sheer color...CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: Highlighted Ingredients:..- Apricot Kernel Oil: Nurtures and soothes lips...- Raspberry Seed Oil: Protects lips against damage from free radicals and environmental aggressors...- Rosehip Oil: Contains vitamins A and E while promoting cell repair and regeneration....Polybutene, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Hydrogenated Polybutene, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Octyldodecanol, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Rosa Canina Seed Oil, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Butylene/Ehtylene/Styrene Copolymer, Aroma/Flavor, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopherol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, MAY CONTAIN (+/-): Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850)....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Swipe on over bare lips or over your favorite lip color for soft, glossy lips.

reviews.review_title: Year round staple in my bag
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My go to lip gloss for awhile now! I love a non sticky creamy gloss! I get shades coconut and pistachio when I buy these, alternating between the two. Both are lovely colors! This gloss is perfect year round

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect gloss! Non sticky, insane shine and super hydrating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have purchased this gloss twice now and it never disappoints! The formula is smooth and feels nice on the lips. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this it smells so good and I used it all. It's really glossy and pretty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: OMGGG LUVV THISSSS PRODUCT GAME CHANGERR. SOO GLOSSSSYY AND PERFFECT

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is super creamy and easy to apply. The color is super pretty but isn't a little dark for me for everyday. It's also super shiny without being sticky or thick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is super creamy and easy to apply. The color is super pretty but isn't a little dark for me for everyday. It's also super shiny without being sticky or thick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing. It's not sticky at all. Super lightweight. Everything you would need in a lip gloss. Also the perfect size to just take wherever you go ufffcufffc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am literally in love with this product. It smells really good, has a good consistency, has a really pretty and flattering color, and is not that pricey compared to other brands. I believe that it's a must-have and I will be buying it again in the future!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful shade, light pigment, hydrating, I would say it lasts awhile, good price overall great lip product

reviews.review_title: Smells delicious and gives beautiful shine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Non-sticky but still glossy! The clear version is my favorite. It has a pleasant sweet smell :)  I've purchased a few of the semi-sheer shades and found the color in those tend to pool into the wrinkles of my lips. Also doesn't smell as good as the clear version.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i got this in coconut and i love the color! a little goes a long way and it works great with light-neutral skin. only issue is that it dries a little quick so you'll have to reapply more often

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The only lipgloss I will ever buy from now on. Every lipgloss claims to not be sticky but this one literally feels like the Laneige lip balm on the lips. I love it so much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i think i own this in every coloru2014i love it so much. not too sticky and complements any look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I needed a good clear gloss and the shade u201cChillu201d did not disappoint! I get very dry lips and the hydration of this gloss lasted hours for me, which is not like any lipgloss I've tried before.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product! I'm obsessed with the this shade specifically. The gloss makes you lips to hydrated and glossy without the annoying sticky-ness and lines when talking! This is going on my rebuy list! I love it so much 10/10 recommended without a doubt

reviews.review_text: Tower 28 lip glosses are so shiny and blinding and nice. I love them so much. Perfect on them own and as well as a topper on other lip products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Finally a company brand I can use for my sensitive lips. I love the colors they give so much shine and is non sticky which is a plus. Thank you Sephora for having the brand Tower 28 for us sensitive girls. Please include more products. Thank You

It was my first time ordering a gloss from Sephora, and it came so fast. It's shiny, but not sticky. The images on how it would look on your skin , are very accurate too. Overall amazing.

reviews.review_text: First I bought Wild. While I liked the gloss, the color was too dramatic for me. So I went back today and bought Coconut. This color is perfect. It feels very neutral. The gloss itself doesn't feel too sticky. It looks nice, I just wish it had a bit more shine. But I do really like it, will be going back for xoxo.

reviews.review_text: This is definitely a u201cyour lips but better (and darker)u201d shade for me. I LOVE the texture. I do wish it had a thicker wand but it's genuinely my favourite lip product, and the first one I've completely finished. Definitely recommend!

The shine is on point and can match with almost anything but the taste, on the other hand is way off.I know most people don't buy gloss for the. Taste but but it plays a big part. I . I would still recommend it but don't expect to much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this gloss! It feels like an oil, but it lasts a long time, like a gloss. The color is pretty pigmented and is my perfect u201cmy lips but betteru201d shade. The applicator is also great for getting precise applications. Love this so much! I have no complaints.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just bought this product and I love it!! The packaging is adorable and so is the actual gloss. My lips feel so hydrated and the color is ud83dude0d It does smell like fresh coconut (it's very faint) but I can see how it can be of putting to others, I liked the smell tho.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ever since I have bought this lip gloss I have loved it! It's not sticky which is always something I don't like about lip products. The shades have a nice variety and I think they smell very nice. Overall a good product I would recommend!

reviews.review_title: Affordable and Great Color but Leaky

reviews.review_text: I've been buying Tower 28 glosses for the past 4 years as a broke college student. Great color and doesn't get overly sticky, but the tube seal weakens overtime and leaks lip gloss.
excellent produit, u00e7a rend mes levres tres hydrater je conseil full!

reviews.review_text: Such a cute colour and the formula is not sticky. Tube is easy to get messy so you have to be careful. Has a slight chemical scent but it's not something that bothers me at all. Overall Cute colour (sesame) and great for the price

reviews.review_text: okay so i'm not a lip gloss girly but i had to try this because i had a feeling it'd be good. i love this & its perfect if you're more into lip balms & oils like me. i will say hydration is good but i'm a vaseline girl so for extra hydration which i feel makes it a little better, put some on before then the product. overall, its really good & i will be buying more <3

reviews.review_text: they weren't kidding when i saw that this was one of the best lip glosses. i purchased the clear cause i personally don't like a lot of colour on my lips, but i actually find this gloss has a tiny hint of pink of it. this gloss is super smooth, and its thickness i enjoy because it lasts longer than most other glosses i've used. so yeah, will be repurchasing!

reviews.review_text: I love this so much, and will definitely be repurchasing it in other colours. I love the look of lipgloss but hate the sticky feeling, so this is the best.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've had this amazing lip gloss for years now and I keep buying it. There is so much product in the tube and lasts you. The price compared to other lip glosses is really good. This is the perfect combinations between lip oil and lip glass because it really shines and lasts and glosses. It does it all! I love this colour because if you put even just a little bit of it it can really make your lips a really pretty colour:) hope this helps!   glass because it gives you that shin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first Tower 28 product and it did not disappoint!! It has an amazing application brush and makes my lips glossy and shiny:) I love the packaging!!  I would have given it6 stars if i could

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty, smells & tastes good, and stays on for a few hours. I plan on buying again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It leaves a really pretty Color and shine, but it has a strong scent of penny's which gets icky after a while. after using it about 10 times it seemed half full, so it does run out quick.
Very nice gloss! Isn't sticky, not much pigmented ( just perfect) and feels really good on the lips. I recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the milky formula and the color is great I definitely would recommend buying this it's worth it

reviews.review_title: love the lip gloss- i don't like the scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the color however, I don't like the smell. I didn't know it had a smell. I don't know what the smell is, it seems similar to something, but I can't figure out what it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so glossy and shiny!! It legit makes my lips looks like water and it's not sticky at all!! Def recommend go buy!!

reviews.review_title: Its great but there is one thing
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Yes!!!! I love this lip! Its so good but the only thing is its kinda hard to blend it out evenly. I bring other lipglosses out and about and just apply them whenever I feel like I need some more but with this i can only wear in the morning when i have a mirror. But otherwise this is great. No to stick or anything!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect in every way. I am sooooo happy I bought this gloss. Perfect color for my skin tone and I love the consistency. Would purchase again.

reviews.review_title: You won't catch me without it now
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this lip gloss, it feels like aquaphor on lips and never gets sticky! I highly recommend this product and will totally be a life time user

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: you know the feeling when your hair gets stuck in your lipgloss and then your hair is sticky? well you won't have that problem with this lip jelly. the non sticky formula is truly one of a kind and leaves your lips shiny and smooth without the need of a touch up

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Dries lips, no hydration, weird texture to wear nearly immediately. Color is good but put a base under the gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love This product so much I definitely recommend this if you have dry lips, absolutely lovely colors and feels good on my lips and you or I don't put a bunch of it on just a little at a time and it works great!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The shade is dark and soo pretty and the lip gloss itself is not sticky it's last a pretty long time Def recommend. I also love paring it with my summer fridays.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i found the product long lasting, looks pretty on lips and is nourishing. runs out quickly though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: 10/10! Color is amazing & universal! This color will look amazing on anyone! Super light weight. Not sticky. FRAGRANCE FREE! This is my go to now for an easy natural look! Paired with/ brown liner, wow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use it every day. It's a really good size and value. My favorite color is pistachio- a rosy nude and it really is hydrating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i loved having this product. the shade was so pretty and i really liked the formula. it was so good my niece took it and she loved it too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I see so much hype on the SOS spray and decided to try some of tower's products. I'm so glad I did because this lipgloss is my FAVORITE lipgloss I've bought. It's creamy, not sticky, and is a perfect sheer gloss. I never write reviews but I just had to on this.
